texts.name: Todd
texts.biography: Few Bracada scientists have actually seen, let alone handled, a hammer or a furnace. Todd, however, had to learn how to use them, unable to convey his esoteric ideas to blacksmiths and coppersmiths. There was also a scarcity of instruments and materials vital to his research in Bracada; Todd journeyed halfway around the world in search of them before finding what he sought in Burton.

specialty.description:
{Automatons and Sentinel Automatons}

Increases Speed of any Automatons or Sentinel Automatons by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for every 4 levels (rounded up).
